entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
